narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first pre-license inspection for a class "C" exhibitor license.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with applicant.
No regulated activity allowed until USDA license has been issued.
Send $75.00 check (or pay via credit card) and send documents to:  USDA APHIS Animal Care
                                                                                                              2150 Centre Ave.
                                                                                                              Building B, Mailstop 3W11
                                                                                                              Fort Collins, CO 80526

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
